1.0.name: wordpress/nofollow-links-in-posts
1.0.description: Nofollow Links in Posts plugin enables you to add the "nofollow" attribute into links in a post within a specified category. This plugin is useful if you are doing sponsored posts. You can set the plugin to add the "nofollow" attribute for posts older than "X" days.
